Name: Battle Imagine - Goblin Guard
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Goblin Guard's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Blade Sweep.

Stunt! Blade Sweep
Summon Elite: Goblin Guard to perform multiple sword energy attacks forward, dealing Attack Damage. Sword energy hits will reduce the target's Armor.
(The effect cannot stack, and only one effect of the same type will be effective.)
Upon the skill cast, your Block DMG reduction is increased for a period.

Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
